properties.name: camel.dataformat.parquet-avro.compression-codec-name
properties.description: Compression codec to use when marshalling.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.parquet-avro.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the parquetAvro data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.parquet-avro.lazy-load
properties.description: Whether the unmarshalling should produce an iterator of records or read all the records at once.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.parquet-avro.unmarshal-type
properties.description: Class to use when (un)marshalling. If omitted, parquet files are converted into Avro's GenericRecords for unmarshalling and input objects are assumed as GenericRecords for marshalling.
